item.description:
LAST MINUTE POSTING...Power Boating season is basically over on the big lake.. Free Parking at Weirs Beach. The leaves will be at their peak. Butts in boats at 11AM sharp. Paddle along the shoreline to Governors Island then across the "no wake" zone to the East side of Stonedam Island. We can proceed through Sallys Gut and decide where to go from there depending on the wind. Water temp as of Wednesday is 61 degrees. I know this trip is on the same day as another one "Concord River Paddle" but I plan to hit the big lake and wouldn't mind the company. 6-12 miles....play it by ear. This is a big lake so wind can cause large waves. No "sit on tops" please. Spray skirts highly suggested.

I will post estimated conditions by Friday afternoon....

Directions:
http://www.weirsbeach...
item.name: Lake Winnipesauklee (Weirs Beach)
